motto.text: 1.Life is a box of chocolate,you never know what you are gonna get.(Forrest Gump,阿甘正傳)
2.無事忙中老，空裡有哭笑，本來沒有我，生死皆可拋。寂滅為樂。（釋聖嚴法師）

items.study: Fluorescent copolymers: synthesis, pH/temp stimulate and sensing metallic ion

motto.text: 氣度，決定你人生的高度。

items.study: Inorganic electrospun nanofibers: fabrication, morphology, and sensor application

motto.text: 夢想，是使人前進的最大動力

items.name: 莊舒媛
items.study: Flexible polymer blend thin film transistors with fibroin as the gate dielectric

motto.text: 不要為明天憂慮，因為明天自有明天的憂慮；一天的難處一天當就夠了。

items.study: Novel fluorescent electrospun nanofibers device for sensing metallic ion

motto.text: 做人沒有夢想，那跟鹹魚有什麼分別

motto.text: Experience without learning is better than learning without experience.Bertrand Russell（英國哲學家羅素)
If you would have a thing well done, you must do it yourself.Henry Wadsworth Longfellow（美國詩人朗費羅)
